name: Cathedral of the Lost Monuments #4 THE WAR DEALER (Animation)
description: The Riders of the Apocalypse in a new modern visual Look and Interpretation.  First the War Dealer is also a 3d Attribute to the great Frank Frazetta and his Painting The Death Dealer from the Year 1973.  Also placed into this scene, are some Fighting Kids original Geometries, from Beeples Manifest Destiny Short Movie
